data.content:
Braum (Pool Party Braum)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: July 30, 2015

Pool Party Braum is a delightful skin that brings a splash of summer fun to the League of Legends. Released on July 30, 2015, this skin allows players to experience the joy of the beach with Braum, the Heart of the Freljord. With his trusty pool noodle and a refreshing attitude, Pool Party Braum is ready to dive into action and protect his teammates.

The Pool Party Braum skin transforms the stoic and mighty Braum into a beach-loving lifeguard. He swaps his traditional armor for a vibrant red and white lifeguard outfit, complete with a whistle and sunglasses. Instead of his usual shield, Braum wields a giant pool noodle, ready to smack enemies with a playful splash. His abilities also receive a thematic makeover, with his Q ability, Winter's Bite, now throwing a beach ball, and his ultimate ability, Glacial Fissure, creating a wave of water to knock up his foes.

But the Pool Party Braum skin is not just about the visual changes. It also brings new animations and sound effects that perfectly capture the essence of a fun-filled day at the beach. From his joyful recall animation, where Braum sets up a beach umbrella and relaxes on a beach towel, to his playful taunts and jokes, this skin truly embodies the spirit of summer.

Now, let's take a moment to delve into the story of Braum, the hero behind the Pool Party Braum skin. Braum, also known as the Heart of the Freljord, is a support champion in League of Legends. Hailing from the icy lands of the Freljord, Braum is a kind-hearted and gentle giant who uses his immense strength to protect the weak and uphold justice.

Braum's past is shrouded in mystery, but legends speak of his incredible feats of strength and heroism. He is known for his unbreakable shield, which he wields with ease to protect his allies from harm. Braum's abilities revolve around crowd control and defense, making him an excellent choice for protecting his team in team fights.

In the game, Braum's role is that of a tanky support champion. His abilities allow him to soak up damage and protect his teammates, making him an invaluable asset in the bot lane. His passive ability, Concussive Blows, allows him to stack up damage on enemies, stunning them once enough stacks have been applied. His Q ability, Winter's Bite, is a skillshot that damages and slows enemies, while his W ability, Stand Behind Me, allows him to dash to an ally and grant them bonus armor and magic resist. Braum's E ability, Unbreakable, creates a shield that blocks incoming projectiles and reduces damage, making him a formidable tank. Finally, his ultimate ability, Glacial Fissure, sends out a line of ice that knocks up enemies and creates a slow zone, providing crowd control and disruption in team fights.

With his kind-hearted nature and unwavering determination, Braum has become a beloved champion in the League of Legends community. His Pool Party Braum skin adds a touch of lightheartedness to his character, allowing players to enjoy the summer vibes while still embodying the spirit of a protector.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Braum, including the Pool Party Braum skin. Whether you're a fan of his classic look or want to dive into the fun with Pool Party Braum, there's something for everyone to enjoy with this lovable champion.

Braum: The Heart of the Freljord

Release Date: May 12, 2014

Within the icy tundra of the Freljord, a hero emerges, wielding a shield as mighty as his heart. Braum, known as the Heart of the Freljord, is a support champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With his unwavering strength and unwavering resolve, Braum has become a beloved figure among players, both for his engaging gameplay and his heartwarming story.

The Legend of Braum

Braum hails from the harsh and unforgiving lands of the Freljord, a frozen wilderness inhabited by fierce tribes and ancient magic. Born into a humble background, Braum was a simple goat herder who possessed an extraordinary strength and an unyielding spirit. His life took a dramatic turn when he encountered a young girl named Ashe, who was being pursued by a fearsome yeti.

Without hesitation, Braum leaped into action, using his immense strength to fend off the creature and protect Ashe. Inspired by his bravery, Ashe invited Braum to join her in her quest to unite the fractured tribes of the Freljord. Recognizing the opportunity to make a difference, Braum accepted, becoming Ashe's loyal protector and ally.

With his trusty shield, Braum stands as a symbol of hope and resilience in the Freljord. He embodies the values of honor, courage, and selflessness, always putting others before himself. Braum's unwavering determination to protect the weak and fight for justice has earned him the admiration and respect of his allies and the people of the Freljord.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Braum's kit is designed to excel in the support role, providing both defensive capabilities and crowd control to protect his allies. His passive ability, Concussive Blows, allows him to stack up to four hits on an enemy, stunning them once the maximum number of stacks is reached. This makes him a formidable threat in the laning phase, as he can lock down enemies and set up kills for his ADC.

One of Braum's greatest strengths is his ability to block incoming projectiles with his Unbreakable ability. By raising his shield, Braum can intercept enemy skillshots and neutralize their damage. This makes him an excellent counter to champions who rely heavily on skillshots, such as Ezreal or Lux. Additionally, Unbreakable also grants Braum and his nearby allies bonus armor and magic resist, further enhancing his defensive capabilities.

Braum's ultimate ability, Glacial Fissure, is a game-changer in team fights. He slams his shield into the ground, creating a powerful shockwave that knocks up enemies and slows them. This ability can be used both defensively, to disengage from fights and protect allies, or offensively, to initiate fights and catch out enemies. The versatility of Glacial Fissure makes Braum a valuable asset in any team composition.

However, Braum does have his weaknesses. His lack of long-range poke or sustain makes him vulnerable to champions who can harass from a distance or poke him down over time. Additionally, his reliance on landing his passive stacks to maximize his crowd control potential means that he can struggle against champions who can easily disengage or avoid prolonged trades.

Braum's Place in the Game

Braum has found a solid place in the League of Legends meta as a reliable and versatile support champion. His ability to protect his allies and disrupt the enemy team makes him a popular pick in both casual and professional play. Braum's presence in team fights can turn the tide of battle, and his ability to peel for his carries ensures their safety in the chaotic nature of the game.

Furthermore, Braum's engaging gameplay and heartwarming story have endeared him to players around the world. His unwavering loyalty and selflessness make him a hero worth rooting for, and his interactions with other champions in the game add depth and charm to his character.

If you want to explore Braum's various skins and see his different looks in action, you can visit our website's dedicated page for Braum. There, you will find detailed information, images, and videos showcasing all of Braum's skins, allowing you to choose your favorite and bring a touch of the Freljord to your games.

So, whether you're looking for a steadfast protector or a champion with a heart of gold, Braum is the hero for you. Embrace the power of the Freljord and join Braum in his quest to defend the weak and uphold justice on the Fields of Justice.

Braum (Crime City Braum)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: November 10, 2016

Crime City Braum is a skin for the beloved League of Legends hero, Braum. This skin was released on November 10, 2016, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP. With its unique theme and stunning visual effects, Crime City Braum offers players a fresh and exciting way to experience the game.

The Crime City Braum skin transforms the heroic support champion into a gritty and determined crime fighter. Dressed in a sleek black suit, complete with a matching fedora and a red tie, Braum exudes an air of mystery and authority. His shield is now a reinforced briefcase, and his trusty door has been replaced with a sturdy vault door. This skin also features new animations, sound effects, and voice lines that perfectly capture the essence of a crime-fighting hero.

One of the standout features of Crime City Braum is the attention to detail in his abilities. When using his Q ability, Winter's Bite, Braum hurls a briefcase at his enemies, leaving a trail of money in its wake. His W ability, Stand Behind Me, showcases Braum's strength as he effortlessly lifts his ally and dashes to their aid. Unbreakable, his E ability, manifests as a bulletproof shield, protecting Braum and his allies from harm. Finally, his ultimate ability, Glacial Fissure, creates a powerful shockwave that shatters the ground beneath his enemies, leaving behind a trail of broken concrete.

Now, let's delve into the story of Braum and his place in the League of Legends universe. Braum, known as the Heart of the Freljord, is a champion revered for his strength, kindness, and unwavering sense of justice. Hailing from the icy lands of the Freljord, Braum was once a simple goat herder who lived a peaceful life. However, fate had other plans for him.

One day, a young girl named Ashe found herself in grave danger as she ventured into the treacherous Howling Abyss. Braum, with his immense strength and protective nature, came to her rescue. Using his trusty door as a shield, he blocked a deadly arrow aimed at Ashe, saving her life. Impressed by his bravery, Ashe invited Braum to join her in the League of Legends, where he could use his strength to protect others.

In the game, Braum is a support champion who excels at protecting his allies and disrupting the enemy team. His passive ability, Concussive Blows, allows him to stack up to four hits on an enemy, stunning them once the fourth hit is landed. This makes him a formidable presence in team fights, as he can lock down key targets and provide crowd control for his team.

Braum's Q ability, Winter's Bite, is a skillshot that damages and slows the first enemy hit. It also applies a stack of Concussive Blows, setting up potential stuns. His W ability, Stand Behind Me, allows Braum to dash to a nearby ally, shielding them from damage and granting them bonus resistances. This ability is crucial for protecting vulnerable carries and turning the tide of battles.

Unbreakable, Braum's E ability, raises his shield, blocking incoming projectiles and reducing the damage taken. This ability can completely nullify powerful enemy abilities and protect his team from harm. Finally, his ultimate ability, Glacial Fissure, sends out a shockwave that knocks up and damages enemies in a line, creating opportunities for his team to engage or disengage from fights.

Braum's strengths lie in his ability to protect his team and initiate fights with his crowd control. His high durability and defensive capabilities make him an excellent choice for players who enjoy a supportive playstyle. However, his weaknesses include a lack of damage output and limited mobility, which can make him vulnerable to champions with high burst damage or long-range poke.

Overall, Braum is a beloved champion in the League of Legends community, known for his kind-hearted nature and unwavering dedication to justice. Whether you're a fan of his classic appearance or interested in exploring his various skins, this page provides you with all the information and videos you need to fully appreciate Braum's appearances in the game.

So, dive into the world of League of Legends and experience the thrill of playing as Braum, the Heart of the Freljord, in his Crime City attire!

Braum (Sugar Rush Braum)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: November 20, 2019

League of Legends is known for its diverse range of champions and their unique skins. One such skin that adds a touch of sweetness to the game is Sugar Rush Braum. This delightful skin transforms the already lovable Braum into a sugary confectionery-themed hero. Released on November 20, 2019, the Sugar Rush Braum skin is available for 1350 RP, allowing players to experience the joy of playing as this delightful champion.

The Sugar Rush Braum skin is a visual treat for players who enjoy whimsical and playful aesthetics. Braum, the Heart of the Freljord, is known for his strength, kindness, and his iconic mustache. With the Sugar Rush skin, Braum's appearance undergoes a sugary transformation, turning him into a delightful candy-themed hero.

In this skin, Braum dons a vibrant and colorful outfit, reminiscent of a classic candy store. His armor is replaced with a candy-coated breastplate, adorned with lollipops and candy canes. His shield is transformed into a giant chocolate chip cookie, complete with icing and sprinkles. Braum's mustache is even given a sugary makeover, with colorful candy pieces woven into its strands.

But the visual changes don't stop there. Braum's abilities also receive a sugary twist. His Q ability, Winter's Bite, now launches a giant candy cane at his enemies, leaving behind a trail of colorful sugar crystals. His W ability, Stand Behind Me, creates a trail of candy wrappers as he dashes to protect his allies. His E ability, Unbreakable, summons a wall made of giant lollipops, shielding his team from harm. Finally, his ultimate ability, Glacial Fissure, creates a burst of candy explosions upon impact, leaving a trail of sugary goodness in its wake.

Now that we've explored the delightful details of the Sugar Rush Braum skin, let's take a moment to delve into the story of Braum himself. Braum, hailing from the Freljord, is a champion known for his unwavering strength and his desire to protect the innocent. With his massive shield and his powerful abilities, Braum is a formidable force on the battlefield.

Braum's past is shrouded in mystery, but his reputation as a hero is well-known. He is often depicted as a guardian and a symbol of hope, always ready to lend a helping hand to those in need. Braum's kind-hearted nature and his willingness to put himself in harm's way to protect others have earned him the admiration and respect of many.

In the game, Braum excels as a support champion, using his abilities to protect his allies and disrupt his enemies. His passive ability, Concussive Blows, allows him to stack up damage on enemies, stunning them once the maximum number of stacks is reached. This makes him a formidable threat in team fights, as he can quickly disable key targets.

Braum's Q ability, Winter's Bite, allows him to throw a skillshot that damages and slows enemies. This ability is crucial for initiating fights and catching out-of-position enemies. His W ability, Stand Behind Me, allows him to dash to an ally, shielding them from harm and providing them with bonus resistances. This ability is essential for protecting vulnerable carries and turning the tide of battles.

His E ability, Unbreakable, creates a shield that blocks incoming projectiles and reduces damage taken. This ability is incredibly useful for mitigating damage and protecting his team from enemy abilities. Finally, his ultimate ability, Glacial Fissure, sends out a shockwave that knocks up enemies and creates a slow zone. This ability is perfect for initiating team fights and disrupting the enemy team's positioning.

With his combination of defensive abilities and crowd control, Braum is a valuable asset to any team. His ability to protect his allies and disrupt his enemies makes him a popular pick in competitive play and a beloved champion among players.

If you're interested in exploring more about Braum and his various appearances, you can find additional information and videos on our dedicated page. Discover the different skins available for Braum and witness the visual transformations that bring this champion to life in unique and exciting ways.

League of Legends continues to captivate players with its diverse roster of champions and their stunning skins. The Sugar Rush Braum skin is a testament to the creativity and imagination that goes into designing these cosmetic additions. So, why not indulge your sweet tooth and experience the joy of playing as Sugar Rush Braum?

Braum (El Tigre Braum)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: April 30, 2015

Braum, the Heart of the Freljord, is known for his unwavering strength, protective nature, and his iconic mustache. As a support champion in League of Legends, Braum has become a fan favorite for his ability to shield his allies and disrupt the enemy team. With his El Tigre Braum skin, he takes on a new persona inspired by the fierce and majestic tigers.

El Tigre Braum is a skin that transforms Braum into a fearless warrior with a tiger-themed outfit. This skin features Braum wearing a tiger mask, complete with sharp fangs and piercing eyes. His armor is adorned with tiger stripes, and his shield is transformed into a tiger's head, ready to protect his allies from any harm. With each ability, Braum unleashes the power of the tiger, leaving a trail of tiger prints and unleashing a ferocious roar.

The El Tigre Braum skin was released on April 30, 2015, and has since become a popular choice among Braum enthusiasts. Priced at 1350 RP, this skin offers a unique and visually stunning experience for players who want to embody the spirit of the tiger while supporting their team.

The Story of Braum

Braum, originally hailing from the Freljord, is a man of immense strength and a heart as big as his muscles. He was once a simple goat herder, living a peaceful life in the harsh and unforgiving lands of the Freljord. However, fate had other plans for him.

One day, a young girl named Ashe found herself in grave danger as she was being pursued by a pack of wolves. Braum, without hesitation, leaped into action, using his incredible strength to fend off the wolves and save Ashe. Impressed by his bravery and selflessness, Ashe invited Braum to join her in her quest to unite the Freljord and bring peace to the land.

Braum accepted Ashe's invitation and became her loyal protector and friend. With his trusty shield, he stood at the frontlines, shielding Ashe and her allies from harm. His unwavering resolve and kind-hearted nature earned him the title Heart of the Freljord, as he became a symbol of hope and protection for the people.

In the game, Braum is a tanky support champion who excels at protecting his allies and disrupting the enemy team. His abilities revolve around shielding his teammates and crowd control. His passive ability, Concussive Blows, allows him to stack up to four hits on an enemy, stunning them once the fourth hit is landed. His Q ability, Winter's Bite, throws a freezing projectile that damages and slows enemies. His W ability, Stand Behind Me, allows him to dash to a teammate and grant them a shield. His E ability, Unbreakable, raises his shield, blocking incoming projectiles and reducing damage taken. Finally, his ultimate ability, Glacial Fissure, sends out a massive ice shard that knocks up enemies and creates a slow zone.

Braum's strengths lie in his ability to protect his team and initiate fights. His shield and crowd control abilities make him a formidable force in team fights, allowing him to peel for his carries and disrupt the enemy team's plans. His passive stun can turn the tide of a battle, and his ultimate can catch enemies off guard and set up devastating combos.

However, Braum does have weaknesses. He lacks strong damage output, making him reliant on his team to secure kills. Additionally, his abilities have relatively high cooldowns, so timing and decision-making are crucial when playing him. Braum's effectiveness also heavily relies on teamwork and coordination, as his abilities are most impactful when used in conjunction with his teammates.

Overall, Braum is a beloved champion in League of Legends, known for his protective nature and his ability to turn the tide of battles. With his El Tigre Braum skin, players can now embody the spirit of the tiger and unleash their inner ferocity while supporting their team.

For more information about Braum and his various appearances, including the El Tigre Braum skin, you can visit the official League of Legends website or watch videos on platforms like YouTube. Embrace the strength and protectiveness of Braum, and join him in his quest to bring peace to the Freljord!

Braum (Dragonslayer Braum)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: April 30, 2015

Dragonslayer Braum, a fearsome and valiant skin for the beloved hero Braum, was released on April 30, 2015. This skin is a part of the Dragonslayer skin line, which features champions who have dedicated themselves to slaying the mighty dragons that roam the world of League of Legends. With its intricate design and thematic elements, Dragonslayer Braum is a must-have for fans of both Braum and dragon-slaying adventures.

Dragonslayer Braum is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP. This skin offers a complete visual overhaul for Braum, transforming him into a formidable dragonslayer. From his armor to his shield, every detail of this skin showcases the hero's dedication to his cause.

The Dragonslayer Braum skin features a new model for Braum, giving him a more rugged and battle-worn appearance. His armor is adorned with dragon scales and intricate engravings, symbolizing his triumphs over the mighty beasts. The shield, which is an essential part of Braum's kit, is also given a dragon-themed makeover. It now resembles a dragon's head, complete with fiery eyes and sharp teeth.

In addition to the visual changes, Dragonslayer Braum also brings new animations and sound effects to the game. Braum's abilities are enhanced with dragon-themed effects, making his presence on the battlefield even more awe-inspiring. From his Q ability, Winter's Bite, to his ultimate ability, Glacial Fissure, every ability showcases the might and power of a true dragonslayer.

Now, let's delve into the story of Braum and how he became the legendary dragonslayer he is today. Braum, also known as Braum the Heart of the Freljord, hails from the icy lands of the Freljord. He is a kind-hearted and gentle giant who has dedicated his life to protecting the weak and standing up against injustice.

Braum's past is shrouded in mystery, but legends speak of his incredible strength and unwavering resolve. It is said that he once single-handedly lifted a mountain to save a village from an avalanche. This act of heroism caught the attention of the Freljord's Iceborn, who recognized Braum's potential and bestowed upon him a magical shield made from the heart of a true iceborn dragon.

With his newfound power and unyielding spirit, Braum set out on a quest to protect the Freljord from the dangers that lurked within. Dragons, being one of the greatest threats to the land, became his primary target. Braum honed his skills and became a master dragonslayer, earning the respect and admiration of the people he saved.

In the world of League of Legends, Braum is a support champion known for his tankiness and ability to protect his allies. His kit revolves around crowd control and damage mitigation, making him an invaluable asset in team fights. Braum's passive ability, Concussive Blows, allows him to stack up his passive on enemies, stunning them once the maximum number of stacks is reached. His Q ability, Winter's Bite, is a skillshot that damages and slows enemies, while his W ability, Stand Behind Me, allows him to dash to an ally and provide them with a shield.

Braum's E ability, Unbreakable, is a powerful defensive tool that creates a shield in front of him, blocking incoming projectiles and reducing damage taken. Finally, his ultimate ability, Glacial Fissure, sends out a massive ice shard that knocks up enemies and creates a slow zone, effectively disrupting the enemy team and setting up plays for his allies.

With his tankiness, crowd control, and protective abilities, Braum is a staple pick in competitive play and a favorite among support players. His ability to peel for his carries and initiate team fights makes him a force to be reckoned with on the Rift.

If you want to learn more about Braum and his various appearances in the game, you can find detailed information and videos on this page. Whether it's his classic appearance or his fearsome Dragonslayer skin, Braum is a hero who embodies strength, courage, and the unwavering spirit of a true dragonslayer.

Braum (Lionheart)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: June 5, 2014

Braum Lionheart is a skin for the beloved League of Legends champion, Braum. Released on June 5, 2014, this skin offers players a visually stunning and thematically fitting alternative appearance for the heroic support champion. Priced at 1350 RP, Braum Lionheart is a worthy addition to any player's skin collection.

The Story of Braum Lionheart

Braum Lionheart is inspired by the legendary tales of knights and chivalry. This skin transforms Braum into a noble and valiant knight, adorned in shining armor and wielding a majestic lion-themed shield. The lion motif is prevalent throughout the skin, symbolizing courage, strength, and leadership.

The skin features a complete visual overhaul for Braum, including new animations, particle effects, and sound effects. Braum's abilities are also modified to match the theme of the skin. For example, his Q ability, Winter's Bite, now appears as a golden spear, and his ultimate ability, Glacial Fissure, creates a stunning lion-shaped ice formation upon impact.

With its attention to detail and thematic coherence, Braum Lionheart truly captures the essence of a noble knight, ready to protect and defend his allies on the Fields of Justice.

Braum: The Heart of the Freljord

Braum, known as the Heart of the Freljord, is a support champion in League of Legends. Hailing from the icy lands of the Freljord, Braum is a gentle giant with a heart as warm as his homeland is cold. He is a protector and a guardian, always willing to put himself in harm's way to shield his allies from danger.

Braum's strength lies in his ability to absorb damage and protect his team. His passive ability, Concussive Blows, allows him to stack up to four hits on an enemy, stunning them once the maximum number of stacks is reached. This makes him a formidable presence in team fights, as he can lock down key targets and disrupt the enemy team's plans.

In addition to his crowd control abilities, Braum also possesses a powerful shield, Unbreakable, which can block incoming projectiles and reduce the damage taken by his allies. This ability makes him an excellent frontline tank, capable of mitigating a significant amount of damage for his team.

Braum's ultimate ability, Glacial Fissure, sends out a massive ice fissure that knocks up and damages enemies in its path. This ability can be a game-changer in team fights, as it provides both crowd control and area-of-effect damage, allowing Braum to initiate fights or disengage from unfavorable situations.

With his protective nature and crowd control abilities, Braum is a staple pick in the support role. He excels at peeling for his carries, setting up kills for his team, and providing overall utility in team fights. His presence on the battlefield is felt by both allies and enemies alike.

Braum's Place in the Game

Braum is a versatile support champion who can fit into a variety of team compositions. His ability to protect his allies and initiate fights makes him a valuable asset in any team. He is particularly effective when paired with champions who rely on basic attacks, as his passive ability can stun enemies and provide opportunities for his allies to deal damage.

In the early game, Braum's focus is on protecting his ADC (Attack Damage Carry) and ensuring their safety. His shield, Unbreakable, can block incoming damage from enemy champions and neutralize their poke. Additionally, his Q ability, Winter's Bite, can be used to slow down enemies and set up kills for his ADC.

In the mid to late game, Braum transitions into a tanky frontline support. His ability to absorb damage and provide crowd control makes him a valuable asset in team fights. He can peel for his carries, disrupt the enemy team's positioning, and initiate fights with his ultimate ability, Glacial Fissure.

Overall, Braum is a well-rounded support champion who brings a mix of defensive capabilities and crowd control to the team. His presence on the battlefield can turn the tide of a game and provide his team with a significant advantage.

Explore Braum's Appearances

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Braum's appearances in League of Legends. From his classic skin to his various thematic and legendary skins, you can witness the evolution of this beloved champion and choose the appearance that suits your playstyle and preferences.

Whether you prefer the noble and valiant Braum Lionheart or any of his other fantastic skins, you can find all the details and visual showcases right here. Step into the world of League of Legends and experience the thrill of playing as the Heart of the Freljord.

Braum (Santa Braum)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: December 15, 2014

League of Legends is known for its diverse range of champions and their unique skins. One such skin that has captured the hearts of players is Santa Braum. This festive skin transforms the already lovable hero, Braum, into a jolly and generous Santa Claus figure. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Braum's Santa costume and explore all the delightful details of this skin.

Santa Braum is a skin that was released on December 15, 2014, just in time for the holiday season. Priced at 1350 RP, this skin offers players a chance to experience the joy of playing as a benevolent Santa Claus on the Fields of Justice.

The Santa Braum skin is a perfect fit for the champion's personality. Braum, known as the Heart of the Freljord, is a kind-hearted and protective hero who always puts others before himself. With his muscular build, bushy white beard, and warm smile, Braum is the embodiment of the holiday spirit.

When Braum dons his Santa costume, he becomes even more endearing. His usual attire is replaced with a red and white Santa suit, complete with fluffy white trim and a big golden belt buckle. His shield transforms into a beautifully wrapped present, and his trusty door-like shield door is adorned with a festive wreath. To complete the look, Braum carries a sack full of presents on his back, ready to spread joy and cheer to all.

But the Santa Braum skin is not just about appearances. It also brings some delightful changes to Braum's abilities. When using his Q ability, Winter's Bite, Braum hurls a snowball at his enemies, leaving behind a trail of frosty particles. His W ability, Stand Behind Me, now creates a magical snowflake shield to protect his allies. And when activating his ultimate ability, Glacial Fissure, Braum summons a massive ice wall decorated with snowflakes, adding a touch of winter wonderland to the battlefield.

Now that we have explored the details of Braum's Santa costume, let's take a moment to appreciate the hero himself. Braum, hailing from the icy lands of the Freljord, is a support tank who excels at protecting his allies and initiating team fights. With his massive shield and incredible strength, Braum can absorb a tremendous amount of damage while providing crowd control and utility to his team.

Braum's past in the game is intertwined with the Freljord's rich lore. He was once a simple goat herder who possessed extraordinary strength and a kind heart. When a young girl named Ashe was being pursued by a fearsome troll, Braum stepped in to protect her. With his bare hands, he punched the troll into submission, earning the respect and admiration of the Freljord's people.

Since then, Braum has become a legendary figure in the Freljord, known for his heroic deeds and unwavering sense of justice. He wields his trusty shield, which he affectionately calls Unbreakable, and uses it to protect the innocent and uphold the values of his homeland.

In the game, Braum's abilities reflect his protective nature. His passive ability, Concussive Blows, allows him to stack up to four hits on an enemy, stunning them once the fourth hit is landed. His Q ability, Winter's Bite, is a skillshot that damages and slows enemies, making it easier for his team to engage. Stand Behind Me, his W ability, allows him to dash to an ally and grant them bonus armor and magic resist. His E ability, Unbreakable, raises his shield to block incoming projectiles and reduces the damage taken by himself and his allies. Finally, his ultimate ability, Glacial Fissure, sends out a shockwave that knocks up enemies and creates a slow-moving ice field, making it difficult for enemies to escape.

Braum's strengths lie in his ability to protect his team and initiate fights. His crowd control and defensive capabilities make him an excellent choice for engaging in team fights and protecting squishy carries. His ability to block projectiles with his shield can turn the tide of battles and save his allies from certain death. However, Braum's weaknesses lie in his lack of damage output and mobility. He relies heavily on his team to follow up on his initiations and lacks the ability to quickly escape dangerous situations.

Overall, Braum is a beloved champion in League of Legends, and his Santa Braum skin adds a touch of holiday cheer to the game. Whether you're playing as the jolly Santa Braum or facing him on the battlefield, this skin is sure to bring a smile to your face.

For more information about Braum and his various appearances, including the Santa Braum skin, be sure to visit our page dedicated to the Heart of the Freljord. You'll find detailed information, videos, and more to satisfy your curiosity about this lovable champion.

Braum (Default)

RP Cost: N/A

Release Date: N/A

Braum, the Heart of the Freljord, is a beloved hero in the world of League of Legends. Known for his unwavering strength and protective nature, Braum has become an iconic champion in the game. His default skin, simply named Braum, showcases his classic appearance and embodies his noble and heroic spirit.

The default skin for Braum is the original and most recognizable look for the champion. It features Braum wearing his signature armor, a massive shield, and wielding his trusty door-like shield, the Unbreakable. The skin perfectly captures Braum's essence as a guardian and protector, with his muscular physique and kind, yet determined expression.

Braum's default skin is available to players from the moment they unlock the champion. It does not require any additional purchase or RP (Riot Points) to use. This means that every player has the opportunity to experience the joy of playing as Braum in his default appearance, without any additional cost.

Now, let's delve into the story of Braum and understand the significance of his default skin. Braum hails from the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land filled with rival tribes and ancient conflicts. Despite the harsh environment, Braum's heart is filled with warmth and compassion. He is a man of honor and integrity, always ready to lend a helping hand to those in need.

Braum's past is shrouded in mystery, but legends speak of his incredible feats of strength and bravery. He is said to have single-handedly lifted an entire mountain to save a village from an avalanche. This act of heroism earned him the title Heart of the Freljord and the admiration of all who heard the tale.

In the game, Braum is a support champion who excels at protecting his allies and disrupting the enemy team. His abilities revolve around shielding his teammates, stunning enemies, and absorbing damage with his massive shield. Braum's passive ability, Concussive Blows, allows him to stack up to four hits on an enemy, stunning them and providing an opportunity for his team to secure a kill.

Braum's strengths lie in his ability to peel for his carries and initiate team fights. His Unbreakable ability creates a shield that blocks incoming projectiles, making him an excellent counter to champions who rely on ranged attacks. Additionally, his ultimate ability, Glacial Fissure, sends out a shockwave that knocks up enemies and slows them, providing crowd control and disruption in team fights.

However, Braum does have weaknesses that players must be aware of. He lacks strong damage output compared to other champions, making him reliant on his team to secure kills. Additionally, his abilities have relatively long cooldowns, requiring careful timing and positioning to maximize their effectiveness. Braum's tankiness can also be exploited by champions with high burst damage or true damage abilities.

In the world of League of Legends, Braum's default skin represents his iconic appearance and serves as a reminder of his noble and selfless nature. It is a testament to his role as a protector and a symbol of hope in the Freljord. Whether you're a fan of Braum's lore or simply enjoy playing as a supportive tank, his default skin is a must-have for any dedicated player.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Braum's appearances in the game. From his classic default skin to his various alternate skins, each one offers a unique visual experience while retaining the essence of Braum's character. Explore the different looks and discover which one resonates with you the most.
